fullDescription.intro:
This node can be used to load SVN log directly from git repository (online version).
To use this plugin You should only give Svn's repository address in configuration windows.
This node analyzes information about every class in every commit from the given svn's repository and returns a table with the following data:
name of class
marker
author of change
action
complete message from commit
original path of class
date of change
Unique ID of record
Action could consists of following values:
M - modification
A - added
D - deleted
fullDescription.option: Address of remote SVN's repository which You want to analyze

It gives a possibility to filter files. Empty box or * means that files with any extension will be displayed. There could be typed more than one extension, to do so, extensions should be splitted by coma.
Prefix of package. It is only used with java files. Empty box lets displaying files with any package prefix.

ports.outPort: Table with data read from SVN repository
